New Money Saving Maryland Program
Boost your business with solar. Going solar will improve your bottom line.

Your business can benefit from today’s low solar prices and incentives. Now is the perfect time to consider solar.
Direct Energy Solar, a leading Maryland-based solar installer, is pleased to announce a new solar financing plan (CPACE). Available to commercial facilities located in Maryland.
KEY BENEFITS OF SOLAR: • Immediate electricity savings • No upfront investment • Substantial long-term electricity savings • Guaranteed power production
Electricity costs drain your bottom line. Go solar with $0 down financing and immediately boost operating income.
Let Direct Energy Solar show you how Maryland’s newly-approved solar financing program (CPACE) makes it easy to reduce your energy costs by going solar with no out-of-pocket costs.
EVERY DIRECT ENERGY SOLAR INSTALLATION INCLUDES: • A custom-designed system to maximize your ROI • Guaranteed system production • Consistent, quality installation • We manage your project from start to finish • The best worry-free guarantees in the business
Get an energy evaluation: <http://www.directenergysolar.com/CPACE?utm_medium=email&utm_source=cpace&utm_campaign=cpacemd&utm_content=email-cpacemd1>
You are receiving this email because your business could benefit from a Direct Energy Solar installation.
Offers and financing are available to customers who qualify, vary by location, and are not available in all areas. We customize our solar power system specifically for your facility, therefore, pricing, savings, utility bill, solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on different factors including but not limited to your location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates.
